item.title: C# List of Tuples with Named Fields
item.description: One of these days I was developing a project using tuples with named fields, making it easier to understand the code when using tuples. I then wanted to create a List of them but the way to do it didn’t seem to be straightforward to me. So I decided to show you all the use cases of tuples in this post. Unnamed fields tuple This is the most simple case of tuples when you don’t specify a name to the fields and they are named by Item1, Item2, etc.
